sections.title: What is the purpose of this app?
sections.content: This app is designed to help engineers and workers perform and manage machine inspections efficiently, track issues, and maintain records for preventive maintenance.

sections.title: Who can use this app?
sections.content: Only authorized users such as engineers and workers registered by your organization can access and use the app.

sections.title: How do I perform an inspection?
sections.content: Select a machine assigned to you, verify it using QR and GPS, and fill out the inspection checklist (look, feel, sound). You can also upload media if issues are found.

sections.title: Can I use the app offline?
sections.content: Yes, you can perform inspections in offline mode. The data will be synced automatically once you reconnect to the internet.

sections.title: What should I do if I find a problem during inspection?
sections.content: Mark the affected check (look, feel, or sound) as abnormal, add a comment, and upload related images or videos to report the issue. The engineer will be notified automatically.

sections.title: What if the machine I want to inspect is not assigned to me?
sections.content: You can still report the issue using the unassigned machine option, and it will be reviewed by the engineering team.

sections.title: Is my data secure?
sections.content: Yes. All inspection data, media files, and user information are encrypted and stored securely following industry standards.

sections.title: Who do I contact for support?
sections.content: You can reach out to your company admin or contact our support team at support@llftech.com for assistance.
